Title: 14.1 Built-In Function and Operator Reference
14.4 Operators
14.4.2 Comparison Functions and Operators
Description: Test a value against a boolean

Tests a value against a boolean value, where
            boolean_value can be
            TRUE, FALSE, or
            UNKNOWN.

Press CTRL+C to copy mysql> SELECT 1 IS TRUE, 0 IS FALSE, NULL IS UNKNOWN;
        -> 1, 1, 1
Examples:
mysql> SELECT 1 IS TRUE, 0 IS FALSE, NULL IS UNKNOWN;
        -> 1, 1, 1
